attributes.action: ask the Queen not to offer the former Speaker Michael Martin a peerage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The House of Lords Appointments Commission suggested that elevating the former Speaker Michael Martin to the House of Lords, the first Speaker to be ousted in 300 years, would damage the reputation of the second chamber. We agree and therefore petition the Prime Minister to ask Her Majesty The Queen not to offer Mr Martin a peerage.
